price: Enti Nea Ɔbͻͻ adeε no Onnim (N’abͻdeε)? Ɔne Onitefo a Onim biribiara mu yie, Amanebͻ Wura no.
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
